text: "Butterflies" is a popular song, written by Bob Merrill and recorded by Patti Page in 1953. It was released by Mercury Records as catalog number 70183. It entered on the Billboard charts on July 18, 1953 and lasted 10 weeks, peaking at #10. On the Cash Box charts, it peaked at #11. ==References== Category:Songs written by Bob Merrill Category:1953 songs Category:Patti Page songs
title: Butterflies (Patti Page song)
